modName: Higher Res East Empire Trading Company Sign with Stencil Fix
summary: Made from scratch, this delightful sign will fill the East Empire Trading Company's employees with pride.
descriptionHtml:
This mod has been updated, and I recommend the change to everyone.

What this mod does:
 - Enhances the diffuse and normal map of the East Empire Trading Company Warehouse Sign with a new, lore friendly 1024x version. Currently available in a regular and original dark and saturated version.
 - Removes the gloss value from the East Empire sign model to make it look more matte and weathered.
 - Enhances the EEC Logo file to remove the 'sticker' look and make it look 'painted' onto crates.
 - Updates the various EEC Crate model UV Maps to display the logo correctly. (Includes SMIM fixes on relevant crates, so its safe to overwrite)

There are various optional files - for example the original diffuse and normal map are available to download if you don't like the new less saturated more bumpy looking version.

Please upload pictures of this mod in different lighting conditions! I want to keep improving it.

Other Mods by Me:

[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52878/?]Cultural Armors - The Khajiit[/url]

[/url]
